item.title: The End of the Union as We Know It
item.author: Lochlann Allison,
item.description: After a long day of uni, I return home to retire for the evening. I slump on my sofa and flick on the tv to a comedy channel for my daily intake of shits and giggles. The comedy channel I refer to is, obviously, BBC News. For the last two weeks, I have watched the comedy sketch, that is Her …

item.title: Imperial dodgeball: Championship teams battle it out in the final tournament of the year
item.author: Lochlann Allison,
item.description: Last Sunday, Imperial Wolverines ventured one last time out of the comforts of London into the wilderness of the north for the final university dodgeball fixture of the year: the University Championship. Teams from far and wide dropped their revision books and grabbed their balls to take part at the …

item.title: Imperial dodgeball – Wolverines stay undefeated!
item.author: Lochlann Allison,
item.description: Going into last weekend, Imperial Wolverines 1st team were leading the University Dodgeball League South, closely followed behind by Hertfordshire Stags A’s in second place. Last Saturday saw the second match of a back to back Imperial/Hertfordshire showdown; the winner of which would most likely go …
